content: I will soon merge the PR for the first milestone which is now finished and ready for review: https://github.com/leanprover-community/lean4-mode/pull/86

Don't expect much from this milestone. It aims to keep the status-quo as-is. It adds a changelog; a Version library header; fixes the Maintainer library header; and reworks the README which is now also provided as Info manual.
Thanks for the review. I merged the branch. Thus, version 1.0.1 is released.
Mekeor Melire has marked this topic as resolved.
